en.av_arrValsPlaceholder: Type some array values, or click 'run' to use random values
en.av_c1: For each pass, we will move left to right swapping adjacent elements as needed. Each pass moves the next largest element into its final position (these will be shown in yellow).
en.av_c3: For each element moving through the list
en.av_c6: Done this pass. The last element processed is now in its final position.
